ModMetaData.name: Milkshakes - Chocolate Edition
ModMetaData.author: Sierra
ModMetaData.description:
[h1]Mod Version: v1.0.2[/h1]
My milkshake brings all the modders to the yard.
This mod adds a new craftable recreation/luxury food (like chocolate).
[b]Features:[/b] [list] [*]Chocolate Milkshakes (Recreation/Luxury Food) [/list] Grants Mood Buff (3) for 24 hours after consumption.
[h1]Want the full collection instead? [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2595980371]Milkshakes - Digital Deluxe Edition[/url][/h1]
[b]Recommended Mods:[/b] [list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2591782692]Milkshakes[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2595706669]Milkshakes - Ambrosia Edition[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2595120517]Milkshakes - Berry Edition[/url] [/list]
[b]Compatibility:[/b] [list] [*]Compatible as long as you're not lactose intolerant. [/list]
[b]Balance:[/b] Wow, so balanced.
[url=https://discord.gg/rimworld]Click here to join us on the Community Discord![/url]
